Source code for maxairesources.utilities.tests.test_multi_train

import sys

sys.path.append("/home/jovyan/max.ai.ds.core/")
import pytest
from unittest.mock import patch, MagicMock

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
import pyspark.ml.classification as classification
from pyspark.ml.classification import GBTClassifier, GBTClassificationModel
from pyspark.ml.tuning import CrossValidator, ParamGridBuilder
from maxaimodel.spark.classification.spark_gbt import SparkGBTClassifier
from maxaimodel.spark.classification.spark_rf import SparkRFClassifier
from maxairesources.utilities.multi_train import MultiTrain



[docs]class TestMultiTrain(object):

[docs]    @classmethod
    def setup_class(cls):
        cls.spark = (
            SparkSession.builder.master("local[2]")
            .appName("gbt-classifier-test")
            .getOrCreate()
        )
        cls.multi_train =  MultiTrain({'SparkGBTClassifier': {'id_col':'ID_code', 
                           'target_col' :'target', 
                           'feature_col' :'feature',
                           'params':{'maxIter':3, 'maxDepth':3, 'seed':42}, 
                           'param_grid':{}},
                           'SparkRFClassifier': {'id_col':'ID_code', 
                           'target_col' :'target', 
                           'feature_col' :'feature',
                           'params':{'maxDepth':3, 'seed':42}, 
                           'param_grid':{}}})



[docs]    def test_trained_models(self):
        trained_models = self.multi_train.trained_models
        assert isinstance(trained_models, dict)



[docs]    @patch.object(SparkGBTClassifier, "fit")
    @patch.object(SparkRFClassifier, "fit")
    def test_train_models(self, mock_gbt, mock_rf):
        self.multi_train.train_models('data')
        mock_gbt.assert_called_once()
        mock_rf.assert_called_once()
        assert bool(self.multi_train.trained_models)



[docs]    @patch.object(SparkGBTClassifier, "predict")
    @patch.object(SparkRFClassifier, "predict")
    def test_predict(self, mock_gbt, mock_rf):
        results = self.multi_train.predict('data')
        mock_gbt.assert_called_once()
        mock_rf.assert_called_once()
        assert isinstance(results, dict)

        


[docs]    @classmethod
    def teardown_class(cls):
        cls.spark.stop()
